channel.title: Firelighters, Colored Logs, Burning them. Possible?
channel.description: I was wondering if it is possible to make a code, or get a code from somewhere that will make firelighters work, colored logs burn with the colored flames and stuff like that. Please help me out with this. I'm trying to pimp out my server :D
